responsibilities: Design and build advanced data science and algorithm solutions to solve business problems such as fraud prevention, AML, user experience customization and optimization, and campaign management.
Understand the payment business and translate business problems into data science and algorithm solutions.
Apply cutting edge machine learning technologies in various payment business use cases.
Own end-to-end model solution lifecycle and work with stakeholders to deliver business impact.
Improve modeling infrastructures, labels, features, and algorithms towards robustness, automation, and generalization.
Enhance risk machine learning excellence in privacy/compliance, interoperability, risk perception, and analysis.
qualifications: Proficiency in designing and building data science and algorithm solutions.
Expertise in machine learning technologies and their application in business use cases.
Ability to translate business problems into data science solutions.
Experience in managing end-to-end model solution lifecycle.
Skills in improving modeling infrastructures and algorithms.
Knowledge of privacy/compliance, interoperability, and risk perception in machine learning.
analysis:
The job responsibilities and skills focus on designing and building data science and algorithm solutions to solve business problems, particularly in the payment industry. The responsibilities include applying machine learning technologies, managing model solution lifecycles, and improving modeling infrastructures. The skills required include proficiency in data science, expertise in machine learning, and knowledge of privacy/compliance and risk perception.

There is no explicit mention of Generative AI (GenAI) or language models (LLMs) in the responsibilities or skills. The focus is on machine learning technologies in general, which can encompass a wide range of techniques beyond GenAI and LLMs. The job seems to be more oriented towards traditional machine learning applications in business contexts such as fraud prevention and risk management, rather than specifically working with GenAI or LLMs.

Therefore, based on the provided information, it does not appear that the job involves working with Generative AI or language models.
